gov.nist.secauto.decima.xml.document.context

Interface XMLContextResolver

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MutableXMLDocument, XMLDocument
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJDOMDocument, CompositeXMLDocument, DefaultXMLContextResolver, JDOMDocument, XMLDocumentFragment

    public interface XMLContextResolver

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      XPathContext getContext(org.jdom2.Attribute attribute)
      Retrieve a Context entry for the provided JDOM Attribute.
      XPathContext getContext(org.jdom2.Content content)
      Retrieve a Context entry for the provided JDOM Content.
      String getSystemId(org.jdom2.Content element)
      Lookup the system identifier of the provided element.
      String getXPath(org.jdom2.Attribute attribute)
      Creates an XPath expression that can be used to query the provided Attribute.
      String getXPath(org.jdom2.Content content)
      Creates an XPath expression that can be used to query the provided content.

    • Method Detail

      • getContext

        XPathContext getContext(org.jdom2.Content content)
        Retrieve a Context entry for the provided JDOM Content.
        Parameters:
        content - the JDOM Content to retrieve a Context entry for
        Returns:
        the Context entry for the provided JDOM Content

      • getContext

        XPathContext getContext(org.jdom2.Attribute attribute)
        Retrieve a Context entry for the provided JDOM Attribute.

        Returns:

      • getXPath

        String getXPath(org.jdom2.Content content)
        Creates an XPath expression that can be used to query the provided content.
        Parameters:
        content - the Content node to build the XPath expression for
        Returns:
        an XPath string

      • getXPath

        String getXPath(org.jdom2.Attribute attribute)
        Creates an XPath expression that can be used to query the provided Attribute.
        Parameters:
        attribute - the Attribute to build the XPath expression for
        Returns:
        an XPath string

      • getSystemId

        String getSystemId(org.jdom2.Content element)
        Lookup the system identifier of the provided element. Implementations of this interface may allow for a single document to aggregate multiple documents that each have different systemIds. In such a case, this method is expected to return the systemId of the inner document.
        Parameters:
        element - the element to lookup a systemId for
        Returns:
        the systemId of the element
